scenes.background: [Bob] raises an eyebrow at your offer for remote guidance.
scenes.description: Monica sighs deeply. 'Remote guidance isn't quite the same as being here in person, you know?'

options.text: I get it. Maybe we can set up a video call to tackle this together?
options.analysis: You show good emotional perception and empathy by suggesting a compromise, but the motivation to physically be there is lower.

options.text: I understand. I'll make it a point to be more available next time.
options.analysis: You acknowledge the concern and promise to improve, showing good self-regulation and social skills, but motivation to resolve the current issue is lower.

options.text: I see your point. We should have a better plan for such situations.
options.analysis: You recognize the issue and suggest planning better, showing good social skills, but your emotional perception and immediate empathy could be better.
